verses.verse: And it came<WG1096> to pass afterward,<WG2517> that he went<WG1353> throughout<WG2596> every<WG2596> city<WG4172> and village,<WG2968> preaching<WG2784> and showing the glad<WG2097> tidings<WG2097> of the kingdom<WG932> of God:<WG2316> and the twelve<WG1427> were with him,

And certain<WG5100> women,<WG1135> which<WG3739> had been healed<WG2390> of evil<WG4190> spirits<WG4151> and infirmities,<WG769> Mary<WG3137> called<WG2564> Magdalene,<WG3094> out of whom<WG3739> went<WG1831> seven<WG2033> devils,<WG1140>

And Joanna<WG2489> the wife<WG1135> of Chuza<WG5529> Herod's<WG2264> steward,<WG2012> and Susanna,<WG4677> and many<WG4183> others,<WG2087> which<WG3748> ministered<WG1247> to him of their substance.<WG5224>
And when much<WG4183> people<WG3793> were gathered<WG4896> together,<WG4896> and were come<WG1975> to him out of every<WG2596> city,<WG4172> he spoke<WG2036> by a parable:<WG3850>

A sower<WG4687> went<WG1831> out to sow<WG4687> his seed:<WG4703> and as he sowed,<WG4687> some <WG3588> <WG3303> fell<WG4098> by the way<WG3598> side;<WG3844> and it was trodden<WG2662> down,<WG2662> and the fowls<WG4071> of the air<WG3772> devoured<WG2719> it.
And some<WG2087> fell<WG4098> on a rock;<WG4073> and as soon as it was sprung<WG5453> up, it withered<WG3583> away, because<WG1223> it lacked <WG3361> <WG2192> moisture. <WG2429>
And some<WG2087> fell<WG4098> among <WG1722> <WG3319> thorns;<WG173> and the thorns<WG173> sprang<WG4855> up with it, and choked<WG638> it.

And other<WG2087> fell<WG4098> on<WG1519> good<WG18> ground,<WG1093> and sprang<WG5453> up, and bore<WG4160> fruit<WG2590> an hundred times. <WG1542> And when he had said<WG3004> these<WG5023> things, he cried,<WG5455> He that has<WG2192> ears<WG3775> to hear,<WG191> let him hear. <WG191>
And his disciples<WG3101> asked<WG1905> him, saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> might this<WG3778> parable<WG3850> be?

And he said,<WG2036> To you it is given<WG1325> to know<WG1097> the mysteries<WG3466> of the kingdom<WG932> of God:<WG2316> but to others<WG3062> in parables;<WG3850> that seeing<WG991> they might not see,<WG991> and hearing<WG191> they might not understand. <WG4920>
Now<WG1161> the parable<WG3850> is this:<WG3778> The seed<WG4703> is the word<WG3056> of God. <WG2316>

Those<WG3588> by the way<WG3598> side<WG3844> are they that hear;<WG191> then<WG1534> comes<WG2064> the devil,<WG1228> and takes<WG142> away<WG142> the word<WG3056> out of their hearts,<WG2588> lest <WG2443> <WG3361> they should believe<WG4100> and be saved. <WG4982>

They on<WG1909> the rock <WG4073> are they, which,<WG3739> when<WG3752> they hear,<WG191> receive<WG1209> the word<WG3056> with joy;<WG5479> and these<WG3778> have<WG2192> no<WG3756> root,<WG4491> which<WG3739> for a while<WG2540> believe,<WG4100> and in time<WG2540> of temptation<WG3986> fall<WG868> away. <WG868>

And that which fell<WG4098> among<WG1519> thorns<WG173> are they, which, when they have heard,<WG191> go<WG4198> forth,<WG4198> and are choked<WG4846> with cares<WG3308> and riches<WG4149> and pleasures<WG2237> of this<WG3588> life,<WG979> and bring<WG5052> no<WG3756> fruit<WG5062> to perfection. <WG5052>

But that on<WG1722> the good<WG2570> ground<WG1093> are they, which<WG3748> in an honest<WG2570> and good<WG18> heart,<WG2588> having heard<WG191> the word,<WG3056> keep <WG2722> it, and bring<WG2592> forth fruit<WG2592> with patience. <WG5281>

No<WG3762> man,<WG3762> when he has lighted<WG681> a candle,<WG3088> covers<WG2572> it with a vessel,<WG4632> or<WG2228> puts <WG5087> it under<WG5270> a bed;<WG2825> but sets <WG2007> it on<WG1909> a candlestick,<WG3087> that they which enter<WG1531> in may see<WG991> the light. <WG5457>

For nothing<WG3756> is secret,<WG2927> that shall not be made<WG1096> manifest;<WG5318> neither <WG3761> any thing hid,<WG614> that shall not be known<WG1097> and come<WG2064> abroad. <WG1519> <WG5318>

Take heed<WG991> therefore<WG3767> how<WG4459> you hear:<WG191> for whoever <WG3739> <WG302> has,<WG2192> to him shall be given;<WG1325> and whoever <WG3739> <WG302> has<WG2192> not, from him shall be taken<WG142> even<WG2532> that which<WG3739> he seems<WG1380> to have. <WG2192>
Then<WG1161> came<WG3854> to him his mother<WG3384> and his brothers,<WG80> and could<WG1410> not come<WG4940> at<WG1519> him for the press.<WG3793>
And it was told<WG518> him by certain which said,<WG3004> Your mother<WG3384> and your brothers<WG80> stand<WG2476> without,<WG1854> desiring<WG2309> to see<WG1492> you.
And he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to them, My mother<WG3384> and my brothers<WG80> are these<WG3778> which<WG3588> hear<WG191> the word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> and do<WG4160> it.

Now<WG2532> it came<WG1096> to pass on<WG1722> a certain<WG1520> day,<WG2250> that he went<WG1684> into<WG1519> a ship<WG4143> with his disciples:<WG3101> and he said<WG2036> to them, Let us go<WG1330> over<WG1330> to the other<WG4008> side<WG4008> of the lake. <WG3041> And they launched<WG321> forth.<WG321>

But as they sailed<WG4126> he fell asleep:<WG879> and there came<WG2597> down<WG2597> a storm<WG2978> of wind<WG417> on<WG1519> the lake;<WG3041> and they were filled<WG4845> with water, and were in jeopardy.<WG2793>

And they came<WG4334> to him, and awoke<WG1326> him, saying,<WG3004> Master,<WG1988> master,<WG1988> we perish.<WG622> Then<WG1161> he arose,<WG1453> and rebuked<WG2008> the wind<WG417> and the raging<WG2830> of the water:<WG5204> and they ceased,<WG3973> and there was a calm.<WG1055>

And he said<WG2036> to them, Where<WG4226> is your<WG5216> faith? <WG4102> And they being afraid<WG5399> wondered,<WG2296> saying<WG3004> one<WG240> to another,<WG240> What<WG5101> <WG686> manner<WG686> of man is this!<WG3778> for he commands<WG2004> even<WG2532> the winds<WG417> and water,<WG5204> and they obey<WG5219> him.
And they arrived<WG2668> at<WG1519> the country<WG5561> of the Gadarenes,<WG1046> which<WG3748> is over<WG495> against<WG495> Galilee.<WG1056>

And when he went<WG1831> forth<WG1831> to land,<WG1095> there met<WG5221> him out of the city<WG4172> a certain<WG5100> man,<WG435> which<WG3739> had<WG2192> devils<WG1140> long<WG2425> time,<WG5550> and ware<WG1737> no<WG3756> clothes,<WG2440> neither<WG2532> <WG3756> stayed<WG3306> in any house,<WG3614> but in the tombs.<WG3418>

When he saw<WG1492> Jesus,<WG2424> he cried<WG349> out, and fell<WG4363> down before<WG4363> him, and with a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> said,<WG2036> What<WG5101> have I to do with you, Jesus,<WG2424> you Son<WG5207> of God<WG2316> most<WG5310> high?<WG5310> I beseech<WG1189> you, torment<WG928> me not.

(For he had commanded<WG3853> the unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151> to come<WG1831> out of the man.<WG444> For oftentimes<WG4183> <WG5550> it had caught<WG4884> him: and he was kept<WG5442> bound<WG1196> with chains<WG254> and in fetters;<WG3976> and he broke<WG1284> the bands,<WG1199> and was driven<WG1643> of the devil<WG1142> into<WG1519> the wilderness.<WG2048>)

And Jesus<WG2424> asked<WG1905> him, saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> is your name? <WG3686> And he said,<WG2036> Legion:<WG3003> because<WG3754> many<WG4183> devils<WG1140> were entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> him.
And they sought<WG3870> him that he would not command<WG2004> them to go<WG565> out into<WG1519> the deep.<WG12>

And there<WG1563> was there an herd<WG34> of many<WG2425> swine<WG5519> feeding<WG1006> on<WG1722> the mountain:<WG3735> and they sought<WG3870> him that he would suffer<WG2010> them to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> them. And he suffered<WG2010> them.

Then<WG1161> went<WG1831> the devils<WG1140> out of the man,<WG444> and entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the swine:<WG5519> and the herd<WG34> ran<WG3729> violently down<WG2596> a steep<WG2911> place into<WG1519> the lake,<WG3041> and were choked.<WG638>
When they that fed<WG1006> them saw<WG1492> what<WG3588> was done,<WG1096> they fled,<WG5343> and went<WG565> and told<WG518> it in the city<WG4172> and in the country.<WG68>

Then<WG1161> they went<WG1831> out to see<WG1492> what<WG3588> was done;<WG1096> and came<WG2064> to Jesus,<WG2424> and found<WG2147> the man,<WG444> out of whom<WG3739> the devils<WG1140> were departed,<WG1831> sitting<WG2521> at<WG3844> the feet<WG4228> of Jesus,<WG2424> clothed,<WG2439> and in his right<WG4993> mind:<WG4993> and they were afraid.<WG5399>
They also<WG2532> which saw<WG1492> it told<WG518> them by what<WG4459> means<WG4459> he that was possessed<WG1139> of the devils<WG1139> was healed.<WG4982>

Then<WG2532> the whole<WG537> multitude<WG4128> of the country<WG4066> of the Gadarenes<WG1046> round<WG4066> about<WG4066> sought<WG2065> him to depart<WG565> from them; for they were taken<WG4912> with great<WG3173> fear:<WG5401> and he went<WG1684> up into<WG1519> the ship,<WG4143> and returned<WG5290> back<WG5290> again.<WG5290>
Now<WG1161> the man<WG435> out of whom<WG3739> the devils<WG1140> were departed<WG1831> sought<WG1189> him that he might be with him: but Jesus<WG2424> sent<WG630> him away,<WG630> saying,<WG3004>

Return<WG5290> to your<WG4675> own house,<WG3624> and show<WG1334> how<WG3745> great<WG3745> things God<WG2316> has done<WG4160> to you. And he went<WG565> his way,<WG3598> and published<WG2784> throughout<WG2596> the whole<WG3650> city<WG4172> how<WG3745> great<WG3745> things Jesus<WG2424> had done<WG4160> to him.
And it came<WG1096> to pass, that, when<WG1722> <WG3588> Jesus<WG2424> was returned,<WG5290> the people<WG3793> gladly<WG2234> received<WG588> him: for they were all<WG3956> waiting<WG4328> for him.

And, behold,<WG2400> there came<WG2064> a man<WG435> named<WG3686> Jairus,<WG2383> and he was a ruler<WG758> of the synagogue:<WG4864> and he fell<WG4098> down at<WG3844> Jesus'<WG2424> feet,<WG4228> and sought<WG3870> him that he would come<WG1525> into<WG1519> his house:<WG3624>
For he had<WG1510> one only<WG3439> daughter,<WG2364> about<WG5613> twelve<WG1427> years<WG2094> of age, and she lay a dying.<WG599> But as he went<WG5217> the people<WG3793> thronged<WG4846> him.

And a woman<WG1135> having<WG5607> <WG1722> an issue<WG4511> of blood<WG129> twelve<WG1427> years,<WG2094> which<WG3748> had spent<WG4321> all<WG3956> her living<WG979> on physicians,<WG2395> neither<WG3756> could<WG2480> be healed<WG2323> of any,<WG3762>
Came<WG4334> behind<WG3693> him, and touched<WG680> the border<WG2899> of his garment:<WG2440> and immediately<WG3916> her issue<WG4511> of blood<WG129> stanched.<WG2476>

And Jesus<WG2424> said,<WG2036> Who<WG5101> touched<WG680> me? When all<WG3956> denied,<WG720> Peter<WG4074> and they that were with him said,<WG2036> Master,<WG1988> the multitude<WG3793> throng<WG4912> you and press<WG598> you, and say<WG2036> you, Who<WG5101> touched<WG680> me?
And Jesus<WG2424> said,<WG2036> Somebody<WG5100> has touched<WG680> me: for I perceive<WG1097> that virtue<WG1411> is gone<WG1831> out of me.

And when the woman<WG1135> saw<WG1492> that she was not hid,<WG2990> she came<WG2064> trembling,<WG5141> and falling<WG4363> down before<WG4363> him, she declared<WG518> to him before<WG1799> all<WG3956> the people<WG2992> for what<WG3739> cause<WG156> she had touched<WG680> him, and how<WG5613> she was healed<WG2390> immediately.<WG3916>
And he said<WG2036> to her, Daughter,<WG2364> be of good comfort:<WG2293> your faith<WG4102> has made<WG4982> you whole;<WG4982> go<WG4198> in peace. <WG1515>

While he yet<WG2089> spoke,<WG2980> there comes<WG2064> one<WG5100> from the ruler<WG752> of the synagogue's<WG752> house, saying<WG3004> to him, Your daughter<WG2364> is dead;<WG2348> trouble<WG4660> not the Master.<WG1320>
But when Jesus<WG2424> heard<WG191> it, he answered<WG611> him, saying,<WG3004> Fear<WG5399> not: believe<WG4100> only,<WG3440> and she shall be made<WG4982> whole. <WG4982>

And when he came<WG1525> into<WG1519> the house,<WG3614> he suffered<WG863> no<WG3762> man<WG3762> to go<WG1525> in, save<WG1508> Peter,<WG4074> and James,<WG2385> and John,<WG2491> and the father<WG3962> and the mother<WG3384> of the maiden.<WG3816>
And all<WG3956> wept,<WG2799> and bewailed<WG2875> her: but he said,<WG2036> Weep<WG2799> not; she is not dead,<WG599> but sleeps. <WG2518>
And they laughed<WG2606> him to scorn,<WG2606> knowing<WG1492> that she was dead.<WG599>
And he put<WG1544> them all<WG3956> out, and took<WG2902> her by the hand,<WG5495> and called,<WG5455> saying,<WG3004> Maid,<WG3816> arise. <WG1453>
And her spirit<WG4151> came<WG1994> again,<WG1994> and she arose<WG450> straightway:<WG3916> and he commanded<WG1299> to give<WG1325> her meat.<WG5315>
And her parents<WG1118> were astonished:<WG1839> but he charged<WG3853> them that they should tell<WG2036> no<WG3367> man<WG3367> what<WG3588> was done.<WG1096>
